promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a young strong gecko psychic-type pokemon holding a purple cosmic sword. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptosworda, a a young strong gecko psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Swift Lunge. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "psychic" or "Cryptosworda". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, gecko-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Dwelling in cryptic ruins, this mysteriously powerful youth can propel forward at light-speed. It wields unseen forces for self-protection.
